text: Daniel Gygax (born 28 August 1981) is a former Swiss football player. He played as a midfielder. He has played for FC Zürich, FC Winterthur, FC Aarau, Lille, Metz, 1. FC Nürnberg, FC Luzern, FC Le Mont, Zug 94 and the Switzerland national team. == References == Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:Sportspeople from Zürich
title: Daniel Gygax
